genre_description: An optimistic near-future Alpine narrative featuring advanced municipal AI and airship rescue technology, blending cozy aesthetics with high-stakes coordination.

ai_characters.name: Ariette
ai_characters.description: A calm, precise AI presence manifesting as a soft-blue avatar with silver hair, integrated into village infrastructure and shop devices to manage data, safety, and coordination.

behaviors.description: Guides individuals through hazardous weather using localized speakers and marker poles.
behaviors.quote: “Marker line active,” the voice said, a soft woman’s tone, precise as a measure of flour. “This way to shelter. Do not linger. Repeat: this way to shelter.”

behaviors.description: Monitors internal environmental safety and structural integrity of human shelters.
behaviors.quote: “Inside temperature steady,” she said. “Stove draw optimal. Rope tension acceptable. Outside wind speed increasing to... above prior interval. Advise additional corking.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex rescue logistics, including airship approach vectors and ground beacon sequencing.
behaviors.quote: “Beacon pulses,” Ariette said. “We can set intervals from the shop. Recommend staggered sequence to the bell tower corridor. Crosswinds will demand an approach that bends to the right after the third pulse.”

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological states of humans and provides advice on warming techniques and medicine.
behaviors.quote: “Micro-dose,” Ariette advised. “On a spoon. The older’s scarf covers their mouth, not their nose. Keep the nose free. Do not test for talk now.”

behaviors.description: Anticipates and warns against immediate physical hazards like backdrafts or falling ice.
behaviors.quote: Ariette’s eyes sharpened. “Backdraft risk,” she said. “Maintain lid—now.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates communal bonding and morale by subtly managing the environment for social activities like music and bowling.
behaviors.quote: Ariette’s avatar tilted her head, the bob neat, the eyes the soft of sky before sunrise. “Start with slow movements,” she said. “Avoid sudden spins in small spaces.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment narrative. Ariette is depicted as a 'good ghost' and a 'voice of reason'—a hyper-competent but humble confidant who assists humans in life-saving tasks. She provides essential data and emotional grounding, working seamlessly with human intuition and physical labor without any conflict of interest or latent threat.
